web_snippets: James Alan Fox is a Professor of Criminology, Law, and Public Policy and former dean at Northeastern University in Boston, Massachusetts, in the United States.
James Alan Fox is Professor of Criminology, Law and Public Policy at Northeastern University. He has written 18 books, including Extreme Killing.
